Pre-Game Insights: Steve Clarke and his players are heading to Faro for a strictly business trip.
Scotland has booked a spot at Euro 2024 with matches to spare after a strong start to the qualification campaign.
The national team needs to get back on track following poor losses to the Netherlands and Northern Ireland.
Steve Clarke selected 28 players for the pre-camp ahead of the finals.
Lyndon Dykes was ruled out due to a major injury.
Scotland and Gibraltar have faced each other twice before, with Scotland scoring six goals on both occasions.
Steve Clarke plans to play a different looking team with several players in need of minutes.
Young Ben Doak could make his debut.
The match will be played on Monday, June 3 at the Estadio Algarve with a 5pm UK time kick-off.
The match will be shown on Premier Sports 1 with coverage starting from 4.30pm.
Premier Sports subscribers can also tune in via the Premier Player.
Daily Record will run a live blog with pre-match build-up, team news, and post-match reactions.
